title: Optimal AI Restaurant Menu Scanning Demo
content: I thought I'd seen everything until my friend showed me Optimal AI... I'm still in shock! showing how Optimal AI helps with restaurant menu scanning
caption: I thought I'd seen everything until my friend showed me Optimal AI... I'm still in shock! #OptimalAI #CalorieTracking #weight_management

scenes.text: I thought I'd seen everything until my friend showed me Optimal AI... I'm still in shock!
Optimal AI makes restaurant menu scanning super easy! 📱
I've never stuck with anything until {app_name} - it's just so effortless!
I had to share {app_name} because it's too good to keep secret!
